name: OD27_5dim_storage
title: OD27 fork of 5Dim's mod - New Storage
author: 5Dim
description:
Storage module for OD27 fork of 5Dim's mod
If you hate limitated capacity of storage tanks, this mod extends its by new tiers.
This mod include:
- 10 tiers of storage tank
- 10 tiers of storage tank with all corner connections
